page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE-TUESDAY
page.content: When my alarm goes off at 7.10am I switch on my television. I watch it until 7.35am then I get up and have my breakfast. I have cornflakes and toast. After breakfast I go through to my bedroom and get dressed. I clean my teeth and brush my hair before I get my coat on. I say "Goodbye" to my mum and go to get my bike ready. I go up to Claire's house and wait till she comes out. We both go up the hill together and then turn left at the crossroads. It is now downhill all the way to the school. I put my bike against the wall and take off my bag. I go and put my bag down in the P7 line. I then play with Claire. We play until it is time to go inside. When we get inside we have music. After music we do language work. Some of us go to recorder. I do.
